tips.li: The alicorn gene grants an ability which will increase a pawns social skills for 60 seconds.
Child plushies require half the usual materials to make and will - for the most part - grant twice the bonus of the adult version.
The child-equippable Rainbow Dash plushie only affects a child's movement speed and not their combat prowess.
Requesting hemogen packs from Nightmare Moon should only be done as a last resort, as her price for this service is quite high.
Mechanitors can request upgrades from Nightmare Moon once the relevant techs have been researched, but doing so is expensive.
Sweetie Bot mechanoids move very fast, but are vulnerable to melee attacks.
